project.description: QDirStat is a graphical application to show where your disk space has gone and to help you to clean it up.

section.title: Cleaning Functionalities
section.content:
In order to use the cleaning functionalities provided by {{ defs.app.friendly_name }}, the `/storage` directory must be mapped with the read/write permissions.
For example, the `docker run` command would include the following parameter: ``` -v $HOME:/storage:rw ```
